data.title: Best Geography Tutors Near Me
data.meta_description: Choose the best vetted Geography tutors in South Africa. Tutoring for in person Geography lessons South Africa and online tutors. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed with Turtlejar Tutoring
data.text:
Sydney G

Woodstock, Cape Town

I use very simple, effective and fun methods so that the student can enjoy whilst learning. I have 5 years teaching experience in this area of specialisation and I understand some of the critical skills for learners to grasp some of the tough topics in this field

Themba N

Central, Kroonstad

I have been performing well with this subject in general and I am very passionate in teaching its content, it relates to my life choices and dreams. Geography is my love and my life. I love to interact with my learners on environmental issues and provide them with knowledge while at the same time instilling love in it as I believe that for one to succeed in anything they're doing, one have to be in love with it.

Mlungisi Z

Sunnyside, Pretoria

Because I am passionate about the subject, I have good subject knowledge and I want to share that knowledge with others to help them understand it better where theyâ€™re struggling. I ensure that I display strong subject leadership, ensure the valuing of student perspectives, build a culture of innovation and display sound subject knowledge, I also engage in continual reflection about i do and why i do it in that way.

Finn M

Protea Hoogte, Cape Town

I have done Geography throughout my schooling career and throughly enjoy the subject. I have a good understanding of the various topics covered and have extensive notes covering everything learnt from grade 10-12. I receive extremely good marks for geography and help fellow class mates to study before tests and exams.

Asemahle M

Westlake, Cape Town

I have achieved this subject with distinction and am currently tutoring, pursuing Honors in Environmental Management field. I have a collective experience in administration and training from various academic institutions, being exposed to teaching environment as a volunteer in Intermediate Phase (Mteteleli JSS), It all came to pass for its appeals to my long interest in engaging with youth as mentorship, development of lesson plans in the new Curriculum Caps and outdoor programmes. I run after-school program, tutoring Maths and Assignment assistance at Westlake United Community Trust hall. I worked for Accernetco: Maths and Science clinic NPO doing administrative and communication office work. The duties in the Programme also empower youth through self-development, drug awareness, and environmental education. Administrative tasks related to reporting, monitoring and implementing plans for the program and outreach programmes Coordinate and facilitate meetings. I am computer literate knowing Microsoft pack. Currently am working at Chrysalis Academy as an admin casual and also responsible for Environmental literacy facilitating assistanc

Fern M

Centurion

I have an honours degree in geography and have always enjoyed the subject. I don't only enjoy teaching it but I also enjoy learning new things about the discipline all the time. I have always had good marks in this subject in school.

Levashnee R

Greenstone Hill, Johannesburg

I am a qualified geological scientist and i received an A for geography in high school. I have a passion for geography and have thus made a career out of it. Geography has always been one of my favorite subjects hence i have always been good at it. With my help and expertise you will be passing with flying colours.

Bohlale Thori Busola M

Hatfield, Pretoria

I did Geographical Sciences throughout high school and continue to take it in University, including Environmental Science where I aced and enjoyed it. I am an aspiring environmental scientist and conservationist hence this passion and personal interest can be proven as an advantage to teach and assist a child effectively as well as for the child to get a deeper understanding of the environment -this will eventually be reflected in their marks.

Noble K

White River, White River

I am passionate about Geography! This is my area of specialisation and have taught the subject for more than 10 years. At High school I passed the subject with distinctions and completed the subject at Degree level and as a Postgraduate teaching qualification. I have various accolades for teaching the subject in public and private schools.
